mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diaries_tb (user_id, date, emotion, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{date}, #{emotion}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT diary_id AS diaryId, user_id AS userId, date, emotion, content, created_at AS createdAt FROM diaries_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date = #{date};

SELECT diary_id AS diaryId, user_id AS userId, date, emotion, content, created_at AS createdAt FROM diaries_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY date ASC;
